name: WinningatSaaS
0:
”Alexa, open Winning at SaaS”
”Alexa, start Winning at SaaS”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: winning at saas
des:
Get battle tested, real world advice on building a B2B SaaS startup from Jason Lemkin of SaaStr. Get quotes on enterprise sales, hiring, culture, biz dev, metrics, product dev, strategy, fundraising and other topics related to SaaS. Quotes are drwan from his Quora answers, blog posts, speeches, and podcasts.

When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
